title: Pippin, Friend to Frodo (1C306)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Companion • Hobbit
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Frodo
Game Text:	Your opponent may not discard your [Shire] tales from play.
Lore:	”'Baggins? Sure I know a Baggins - Frodo's my second cousin once-removed, on his mother's side and my third cousin twice-removed on his father's side, if you follow me.'”
Rarity:	C
